description: Bolt Metals Corp., an exploration company, focuses on the acquisition and development of mineral properties for lithium-ion battery industry in Indonesia. Its flagship project is the Cyclops nickel-cobalt project covering an area of approximately 5,000 hectares with nine cobalt prospects located in Papua province, Indonesia. The company was formerly known as Pacific Rim Cobalt Corp. and changed its name to Bolt Metals Corp. in February 2020. Bolt Metals Corp. is headquartered in West Vancouver, Canada.
